org.toolboxframework.validate

Class Validate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.toolboxframework.validate.Validate

  • public class Validate
extends java.lang.Object
    The Validate class contains logic for validating input to Toolbox's public APIs.

      • isValidToolName

        public static void isValidToolName(java.lang.String value)
        Validate that a String can be used as a tool name.

        Any non-blank String is acceptable, however, in order to take advantage of the mechanism that falls back to using the name of the field as the tool name when performing field injection and it is not possible to resolve the tool by type, we recommend using names that conform to the restrictions placed on field names.

        Parameters:
        value - the tool name to be validated
        Throws:
        InvalidToolNameException - if the String cannot be used as a tool name

      • isJavaPackageName

        public static void isJavaPackageName(java.lang.String value,
                                     java.lang.String name)
        Validate that a String matches the pattern of a Java package.
        Parameters:
        value - the String to be validated
        name - the name of the String to be validated
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the String is does not match the pattern of a Java package
